long_prompt: A sleek, curved vertical boat gliding effortlessly along the serene waters of a tranquil river, its polished wooden hull reflecting the gentle ripples and sunlight filtering through the lush canopy overhead.

A sleek, curved vertical boat, its hull painted in a glossy black, glides effortlessly across a shimmering river, its polished wood planks gleaming under the soft morning light, as a gentle breeze carries the scent of blooming flowers and ripening fruit from the lush riverbanks.

A curved, vertical boat with sleek, polished wood planks gently gliding through calm, crystal-clear waters under the warm embrace of a golden sunset, its gentle sway accentuated by the soft ripples on the surface.
negative_long_prompt: A sturdy, straight vertical boat moored securely to the riverbank, its simple wooden hull resting on the gentle waters of a peaceful river, with the towering trees lining the banks providing a sense of tranquility and solitude.

A sturdy, straight-lined boat with a rugged wooden hull, its white paint chipped and worn, rests gently against the muddy riverbank, its outboard motor still churning the water as a soft morning mist swirls around its hulls, carrying the whispers of the river and the promise of adventure.
A straight, flat boat gliding through calm, crystal-clear waters under the warm embrace of a golden sunset, its gentle sway accentuated by the soft ripples on the surface.
